channel.title: OMRON Industrial Automation
channel.description: OMRON Industrial Automation functions as a partner to help innovate worldwide manufacturing. Through our experience in sensing and control technology, we enable manufacturers to operate with greater productivity and streamlined efficiency.

item.title: Switch Mode Power Supply (15/30/50/100/150/300/600-W Models)
item.description: Superior Basic Performance That Ensures Reliability. Wide Range of Standards Certification and Greater Usability.(S8FS-G)

item.title: PCB Inspection System
item.description: The new series for VT-S730, Full-3D Inspection Systems(VT-S730-H)

item.title: Cables for I/O Relay Terminals
item.description: Connect I/O Relay Terminals to I/O Units for Programmable Controllers with one touch.(XW2Z-R)

item.title: NX-series NX1P2 CPU Units
item.description: Up to eight axes of control via EtherCAT(NX1P2)

item.title: Power Monitor
item.description: Global Power Monitor for On-panel Installation(KM-N3-FLK)

item.title: Industrial PC Platform NY-series IPC Programmable Multi-Axis Controller
item.description: High-speed, high-precision motion controller plus PC - in one box(NY51[]-A)

item.title: Programmable Multi-Axis Controller
item.description: A controller with a width of only 28.6 mm provides complete control(CK3E)

item.title: Industrial PC Platform NY-series IPC Machine Controller
item.description: The future will be IT driven, we make you part of it(NY5[][]-1)

item.title: Industrial PC Platform NY-series Industrial Monitor
item.description: Very stylish, very industrial(NYM)

item.title: Industrial PC Platform NY-series Industrial Box PC
item.description: Powerful. Tough. Future-Proof.(NYB)

item.title: Industrial PC Platform NY-series Industrial Panel PC
item.description: Works great, looks great.(NYP)

item.title: IO-Link Proximity Sensor (Standard Models)
item.description: IO-Link Makes Sensor Level Information Visible and Solves the Three Major Issues at Manufacturing Sites! Standard Proximity Sensor.(E2E-[]-IL[])

item.title: IO-Link Proximity Sensor (Spatter-resistant Models)
item.description: IO-Link Makes Sensor Level Information Visible and Solves the Three Major Issues at Manufacturing Sites! A Proximity Sensor That Can Be Used in a Spatter Environment.(E2EQ-[]-IL[])

item.title: GX-series IO-Link Master Unit
item.description: IO-Link makes sensor level information visible and solves the three major issues at manufacturing sites! The unit for M12 Smartclick connector can be used in watery, and dusty environments.(GX-ILM08C)

item.title: IO-Link Photoelectric Sensor
item.description: IO-Link Makes Sensor Level Information Visible and Solves the Three Major Issues at Manufacturing Sites! Standard Photoelectric Sensor.(E3Z-[]-IL[])

item.title: NX-series Heater Burnout Detection Unit
item.description: Build a temperature control system with heater burnout detection in conjunction with a temperature input unit and PID instructions(NX-HB)

item.title: NX-series Load Cell Input Unit
item.description: Build a cost saving weighing/ measurement system by using load cells(NX-RS[][][][])

item.title: NX-series IO-Link Master Unit
item.description: IO-Link makes sensor level information visible and solves the three major issues at manufacturing sites! The screwless clamping terminal block reduces wiring work.(NX-ILM400)

item.title: AC Servo System 1S-series
item.description: Optimized installation and setup Increased machine productivity Global availability and global conformance(R88M-1[] / R88D-1SN[]-ECT)

item.title: Color Mark Photoelectric Sensor
item.description: Color Mark Detection on Any Type of Packaging. Narrow Beam and Large Lens for Stable Detection of Workpieces Tilted at Various Angles.(E3S-DC)

item.title: Color Fiber Amplifier Unit
item.description: Smart Fiber Amplifier Units with White LEDs. High Color Discrimination Capability with the Same Easy Operation as Previous Fiber Amplifier Units. Existing General-purpose Fiber Units Can Be Connected.(E3NX-CA)

item.title: I/O Solid State Relays
item.description: SSR with Plug-in Terminals The Same Shape as the G2R-1-S Power Relays(G3R-I/O)

item.title: Power Monitor
item.description: Global Power Monitor for Mounting Inside Control Panels(KM-N2-FLK)

item.title: Temperature Sensor with Ferrule (Exclusive Models)
item.description: Bayonet spring for molding machines, Crimping terminals, Used for measuring surface temperatures, Used for room temperature measurement, Waterproof model, Siliconecovered lead wires(E52 with Ferrule (Exclusive Models))

item.title: Temperature Sensor with Ferrule (Low-cost Models)
item.description: Low-cost platinum resistance thermometers, Low-cost thermocouples(E52 with Ferrule (Low-cost Models))

item.title: Temperature Sensor with Ferrule (General purpose Models)
item.description: Sheathed platinum resistance thermometers, Sheathed thermocouples(E52 with Ferrule (General purpose Models))

item.title: Solid-state Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Miniature Timer with Multiple Time Ranges and Multiple Operating Modes.(H3YN-[]-B)

item.title: Solid-state Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Miniature Timer Compatible with the MY Relay.(H3Y-[]-B)

item.title: Software
item.description: ACE provides a host of innovative features that allow you to increase productivity while streamlining configuration setup(Automation Control Environment (ACE))

item.title: Pendant
item.description: Excellent operability and ergonomic design(T20 Pendant)

item.title: Robot Controllers
item.description: High-performance robot motion controller capable of high-speed processing(SmartController EX)

item.title: Vision System
item.description: Dependable vision system optimized for robot applications(SmartVision MX)

item.title: Articulated Robots
item.description: Articulated robot for machining, assembly, and material handling(Viper 850)

item.title: SCARA Robots
item.description: Overhead-mount large SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling(eCobra 800 Inverted Lite / Standard / Pro)

item.title: Articulated Robots
item.description: Articulated robot for machining, assembly, and material handling(Viper 650)

item.title: SCARA Robots
item.description: Large SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling(eCobra 800 Lite / Standard / Pro)

item.title: SCARA Robots
item.description: Mid-size SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling(eCobra 600 Lite / Standard / Pro)

item.title: Temperature Monitoring Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Ideal to prevent heater overheating. Self-latching output to contribute to safe equipment operation.(K8DT-TH)

item.title: Three-phase Voltage, Asymmetry, and Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Detect overvoltages, undervoltages, voltage asymmetry, phase sequence, and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PZ)

item.title: Three-phase Voltage and Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Protect motors and other equipment by detecting overvoltages, undervoltages, phase sequence, and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PM)

item.title: Phase-sequence Phase-loss Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Protect motors and other equipment from unstable voltages in the power supply system. Protect motors and other equipment by detecting phase sequence and phase loss for three-phase power supplies.(K8DT-PH)

item.title: Conductive Level Controller
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Ideal for water level control. Sensitivity adjustment and timer for easy usage.(K8DT-LS)

item.title: Single-phase Overvoltage/Undervoltage Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect abnormal voltages applies to equipment to protect against equipment failure. Monitor for overvoltages and undervoltages simultaneously with one Relay.(K8DT-VW)

item.title: Single-phase Voltage Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect abnormal voltages applies to equipment to protect against equipment failure. Use in either overvoltage or undervoltage mode.(K8DT-VS)

item.title: Single-phase Overcurrent/Undercurrent Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect errors in motors and other equipment through current changes. Monitor for overcurrents and undercurrents simultaneously with one Relay.(K8DT-AW)

item.title: Single-phase Current Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Detect errors in motors and other equipment through current changes. Use in either overcurrent or undercurrent mode.(K8DT-AS)

item.title: S8VK-S (60/120/240/480-W Models)
item.description: A Perfect Fit for Small Control Panels Coated PCBs for Better Resistance to Environment Connections for Easy Wiring(S8VK-S)

item.title: SCARA Robots
item.description: Small SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling(Cobra 350)

item.title: NX-series Communications Interface Units
item.description: Provides simplicity and flexibility in connecting serial devices to EtherCAT(NX-CIF)

item.title: Parallel Robots
item.description: Four-axis parallel robot achieves high speed and high precision(Quattro 800H)

item.title: Solid-state timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Compact, Multi-function Timers for G2R Relay Socket.(H3RN-[]-B)

item.title: Parallel Robots
item.description: Four-axis parallel robot achieves high speed and high precision(Quattro 650H / HS)

item.title: Solid State Relays for Heaters
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Single-phase SSR for low heat generation enables carrying 25 A (G3PJ-[]25B(-PU)) even for close mounting of three SSRs to contribute to downsizing of control panels. Models available with push-in input terminals.(G3PJ)

item.title: I/O Relay Terminal
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. I/O Relay Terminals with 16 Points and Push-In Plus terminal blocks to Downsize Control Panels and Save Labor.(G70V)

item.title: Slim I/O Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Global standard size, low profile slim I/O relay with width 6.2 mm.(G2RV-SR)

item.title: Slim I/O Solid State Relay
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Global standard size, low profile type slim I/O solid state relay with width 6.2 mm.(G3RV-SR)

item.title: Push-In Plus Terminal Block Sockets
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Sockets with Push-In Plus Terminal Blocks to Save Work Added to Series for MY and G2R-S Relays.(PYF-[][]-PU / P2RF-[][]-PU)

item.title: Power OFF-delay Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Set two time ranges with each Timer, from 0.1 to 12 seconds for the S Series and from 1.0 to 120 seconds for the L Series.(H3DT-H)

item.title: Star-delta Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Set two time ranges between 1 and 120 s with one Timer.(H3DT-G)

item.title: Twin Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Switch between flicker-OFF or flicker-ON start mode.(H3DT-F)

item.title: Power ON-delay Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Single Mode Timers with power ON delay operation.(H3DT-A)

item.title: Multi-range, Multi-mode Timer
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Multiple time ranges and operating modes let you cover a wide range of applications.(H3DT-N / -L)

item.title: DIN Track Terminal Blocks with Screw Terminals
item.description: Global-standard DIN Terminal Blocks for Control Panels(XW5T-S)

item.title: DIN Track Push-in Terminal Blocks
item.description: Our Value Design Products Increase the Value of Your Control Panels. Push-in Plus Terminal Blocks to Downsize Control Panels and Save Work.(XW5T-P)

item.title: Confocal Fiber Displacement Sensor
item.description: Reliable measurements for any material and surface types(ZW-7000)

item.title: Parallel Robots
item.description: Parallel robot ideal for use in the food and beverage, pharmaceutical, and healthcare industries(Hornet 565)

item.title: Fiber Unit Build-in Lens Series, Flat Model
item.description: Optical Axis Adjustment in 20 Sec and Ultra-high-power Beam Greatly Reduce Installation and Maintenance Work(E32-LT35Z)

item.title: NJ-series NJ Robotics CPU Units
item.description: New controller that covers functions and high-speed processing required for machine control and safety, reliability and maintainability that are the features of industrial controllers provides parallel link robot control function. In addition to robot control, general motion control with up to 64 axes can be also performed.(NJ501-4[][][])

item.title: Sysmac Library
item.description: The Sysmac Library for the NJ/NX/NY Controller provides Function Blocks packed with know-how that makes advanced control easy.(SYSMAC-XR[][][])

item.title: Switch Mode Power Supply (15/25/35/50/75/100/150/200/350-W Models)
item.description: High Reliability at a Reasonable Cost. Reliable, Basic Power Supplies That Contribute to Stable Equipment Operation.(S8FS-C)

item.title: CMOS Laser Sensor with Built-in Amplifier
item.description: Stable Detection of Level Differences in the Order of 0.1 mm(ZX0)

item.title: Screwless Clamp Terminal Sockets
item.description: New Screwless Terminal Sockets Added for MY and G2R Relays.(PYF[][]S / P2RF-[][]-S)

item.title: High-resolution Telecentric Lens for C-mount cameras
item.description: High-resolution telecentric lens for megapixel camera(3Z4S-LE VS-TCH Series)

item.title: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS)
item.description: Compact UPS best suited for prevention of voltage drop/power failure in industrial-purpose computers (IPC)/controllers. This UPS adopts a lithium-ion battery and DIN rails can be attached to it.(S8BA)

item.title: Transparent Object Detection Photoelectric Sensor
item.description: Superb Detection of Many Types of Transparent Objects(E3S-DB)

item.title: Rectangular Proximity Sensor
item.description: Freely Change the Sensing Direction(E2Q6)

item.description: 30-mm dia. Key-type Selector Switches Control panel miniaturization through a more compact design and modified wiring direction. Addition of Push-In Plus terminal blocks for easy wiring. Workability and safety improvements.(A30NK)

item.title: Selector Switches
item.description: 30-mm dia. Knob-type Selector Switches Control panel miniaturization through a more compact design and modified wiring direction. Addition of Push-In Plus terminal blocks for easy wiring. Workability and safety improvements.(A30NS / A30NW)

item.description: 30-mm dia. Pushbutton Switches Control panel miniaturization through a more compact design and modified wiring direction. Addition of Push-In Plus terminal blocks for easy wiring. Workability and safety improvements.(A30NN / A30NL)

item.title: Key-type Selector Switches
item.description: 22-mm dia. Key-type Selector Switches. Control panel miniaturization through a more compact design and modified wiring direction. Addition of Push-In Plus terminal blocks for easy wiring.(A22NK)

item.description: Connect I/O Terminal Blocks (XW2[]) to I/O Units of Programmable Controllers. Fast and Faultless.(XW2Z-L)
